descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Turning your Meta Quest into a spatial computer by letting you place your web apps all around your space. You have an infinite canvas to browse, work, relax, or watch a movie.
‎
# **Infinite canvas**

Browse from our vast library of apps and place them wherever you want. You can also make your own custom app and use them as well.
[media]


‎ 
# **Cinema mode**

Our immersive ambient lighting makes revisiting your favorite movies even more special.

We support Disney+, MAX, Apple TV+, Prime Video, Plex, Youtube, and other services like Hulu or Paramount+ as custom apps made by you.
[media]
*Netflix is not supported on third party Meta Quest browsers, including The Spatial App

‎ 
# **Productivity**

Cast your computer to a large virtual monitor. Place our Widgets like a timer, sticky note, calculator, or a simple clock next to it for full productivity.
[media]


‎ 
# **Environments**

Cancel out distractions with our stunning environments. Go to the Stratosphere, Deep space, or chill in an ambient void.
[media]


‎ 
# **Polished UI**

We have the best look and feel among all third party browsers on the Meta Quest store.
[media]


‎ 
# **Intuitive UX**

You can use The Spatial App with either controller or your hands, form up close, or from a far. You can turn off tracking when interacting with the real world.
[media]
